item.title: Running Apache Airflow locally on Kubernetes (minikube)
item.description: The goal of this guide is to show how to run Airflow entirely on a Kubernetes cluster. This means that all Airflow componentes (i.e. webserver, scheduler and workers) would run within the cluster.
